sentences.sContent: The student looked at him, perplexed.
sentences.sCn: 那个学生看着他，一脸的茫然。

sentences.sContent: Perplexed investors tried to work out what the deal meant.
sentences.sCn: 投资者感到困惑，试图搞清这个协议意味着什么。

words.tran: 复杂的，令人费解的；令人困惑的
使困惑，使为难；使复杂化

trans.tranCn: 困惑的, 不知所措的
trans.tranOther: confused and worried by something that you do not understand
